prompt:
Describe how you would analyze a set of customer reviews to identify common themes and trends in the data.
In my e-commerce business, I want to analyze customer feedback on various products. I need to identify patterns in their comments that can help improve product features and boost sales. Here's an example of a recent customer review for one of our top-selling items: "I love this product! It's sturdy and lasts long, but it could be more comfortable for my back."
